page.title: 15Cannington in 75 Years Time
page.content: This year Halley's Comet will be seen.It will not be seen again for almost 75 years.This is what our class thinks will happen within the next 75 years.We think a new source of power will be invented or found. Robots and computers will take over all hard and boring jobs and will take over in the home. There will be more free time for sports,hobbies etc. We will not have to work such long hours. We will be able to holiday in outer space. Advances in medicine and medical care will mean we will live much longer. People will be living in colonies on the moon. Cars will no longer be petrol driven but will be electrical. There will not be any teachers,and children will learn from computers.
